Text: Wilson is suggesting we lie about how well we're doing so we potentially get a raise due to exceeding expectations.
Option1: We have to be honest about our report| besides| we don’t want to set unrealistic expectations for us in the future which will end up hindering us.
Option2: Lying would mean the others may get a raise… This'll help motivate them to do better as well to actually meet the higher expectation.
Option3: Be mostly honest about the report but make Evan appear better just to satisfy him.
